headline: GE HealthCare Advances Its Cloud Strategy by Unveiling the Genesis Portfolio to Improve Speed of Digital Innovation Adoption
summary: LAS VEGAS, March 04, 2025--GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) today announced its new Genesis solutions, a portfolio of cloud enterprise imaging software-as-a-service (SaaS) solutions. Four features will be offered when commercially released – edge, storage, vendor neutral archive and data migration.i These cloud solutions, are designed to help enhance healthcare organizations’ efficiency and precision, streamline workflows, and optimize the use of capital and IT resources.
